data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Degma, Peter, Michalczyk, Łukasz, Kaczmarek, Łukasz (2008): Macrobiotus derkai, a new species of Tardigrada (Eutardigrada, Macrobiotidae, huziori group) from the Colombian Andes (South America). Zootaxa 1731: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181336
